metadata.title: Adama Soaps - Natural Handcrafted Soaps from Coffee Grounds
metadata.description: Eco-friendly handcrafted soaps made from used coffee grounds. Natural, sustainable, and good for your skin.

hero.title: Soap Crafted from Used Coffee Grounds
hero.description:
Explore our eco-friendly soaps crafted with care using natural ingredients, designed to rejuvenate your skin while honoring the planet.

Crafted from recycled coffee grounds, this natural body scrub soap gently exfoliates the skin while deeply nourishing it with rich plant oils.

The finely ground coffee removes dead skin cells and stimulates circulation, leaving your skin smooth, refreshed and alive.

Shea butter supports and protects the skin barrier, coconut oil cleanses gently with a creamy lather, olive oil softens and conditions the skin, and castor oil adds an extra layer of care for a silky finish. Free from microplastics and unnecessary additives, this soap turns waste into well-being â€” a daily ritual that's good for your skin and the planet.

ourStory.title: Our Story
ourStory.whoWeAreText: At Adama Soaps, we pride ourselves on creating natural, eco-friendly soaps from used coffee grounds. Our focus is on simplicity, honesty, and sustainability, aiming to reduce waste while delivering high-quality products that nurture your skin.
ourStory.ourMissionText: We strive to promote sustainability through our handcrafted soaps and engage consumers about the benefits of coffee grounds as an ingredient.
ourStory.whyText: Our commitment to the environment guides every step of our process, from sourcing materials to packaging, ensuring that your choice of soap is one that supports a healthy planet.

calm.name: Calm
calm.description:
Calm is your moment of pause.

The soft, floral scent of lavender gently wraps around your senses, helping to slow down the mind and relax the nervous system. Known for its balancing and calming properties, lavender supports deep relaxation and makes this soap perfect for evening showers or moments when you want to unwind.

Combined with the natural exfoliating power of recycled coffee grounds and nourishing plant oils, Calm leaves your skin smooth, cared for and your body gently grounded.

A quiet ritual. A deep breath. A sense of ease.

sunny-sage.name: Sunny Sage
sunny-sage.description:
Sunny Sage is clarity with a smile.

Herbal, earthy sage meets the bright, uplifting freshness of orange â€” a scent that feels both cleansing and energising. Sage is traditionally known for its purifying and clarifying qualities, while orange essential oil brings warmth, lightness and a natural mood boost.

This combination makes Sunny Sage the perfect companion for morning showers or moments when you want to reset, recharge and feel refreshed from head to toe.

A subtle spark of sunshine on your skin.

about.title: Our Sudsy Story
about.paragraph1: It all started when my boyfriend said, "Honey, we should make soap!" I thought he was being clean about our relationship, but noâ€”he literally meant soap.
about.paragraph2: Armed with nothing but recycled coffee grounds (because apparently throwing them away is a grounds for divorce) and an unreasonable amount of YouTube tutorials, we embarked on our lathery journey.
about.paragraph3: The first batch? Let's just say it was a total wash. The second batch? A clean sweep of failures. But by the third batch, we finally got it rightâ€”and that's when things really started to soap up!
about.paragraph4: Now we make all our soaps by hand in Germany, using only the finest natural ingredients and a healthy dose of questionable puns. Our motto? "We're lye-ing if we say it's easy, but we're not lye-ing about the quality!"
about.paragraph5: P.S. My boyfriend insists I mention that she does 90% of the actual work. I provide moral support and terrible jokes. It's a clean division of labor. ðŸ§¼
about.whyCoffeeGroundsText: Because we're recycling champions and because coffee grounds are nature's best exfoliant. Plus, it gives us an excuse to drink more coffee during the "research phase." Win-win! â˜•
